RelatedSentence: - A central Florida woman was joyously reunited with her daughter after nearly five years after authorities tracked the girl down in Mexico .

The Volusia County Sheriff 's Office said Jodie Borchert of Deltona was reunited with her 12 - year - old daughter Saturday in Miami , where the girl was transported after being found in the mountainous region of Hidalgo , Mexico , about two hours outside Mexico City .
The child 's father , Aaron Cox , fled with the girl in August 2009 , police said .
The child 's father , Aaron Cox , fled with the girl in August 2009 , police said .
It 's not known whether he has obtained an attorney .
It is such a huge relief to bring this case to a successful conclusion , said Brandon Haught , a spokesman for the Volusia County Sheriff 's Office .
It is such a huge relief to bring this case to a successful conclusion , said Brandon Haught , a spokesman for the Volusia County Sheriff 's Office .

Authorities have pursued the case since the girl 's disappearance , but said no viable leads had emerged until Monday , when a tip was received at the National Center For Missing and Exploited Children .

Cox was arrested without incident , authorities said .
